text_block_list.text:
One weekend, I was having a stroll through town 
when I spotted a rather upbeat Eishin Flash.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……! Trainer! I didn't expect to run into you.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I visited a number of cake shops today. They all had their 
unique charms, and I had a great time, so I was writing down 
my experiences before I forget too much.
choice_data_list: You really love your cakes, huh.
You really love your cakes, don't you.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……Well, as you know, my parents run a cake shop. 
Ever since I still lived in Germany, I liked to check out 
the other shops as a form of research.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Not just for taste, but also things like the interior, location, 
what cakes were on display, the clientele… I examine them 
in a total of fifteen different aspects.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Hence, you are right to say that I like cakes, but perhaps 
it's more apt to say that I like cake shops.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I planned on dropping by one more place today. 
Although, it's a café, rather than a cake shop.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: It's actually my main destination, called Moon Cafe, and about a fifteen minute walk away, through the residential area starting the second street behind you.
choice_data_list: Would you mind if I came along?

text_block_list.text:
Eishin Flash was generally unforthcoming when it came to 
matters outside training, so this seemed like a good chance 
to get to know her a little better.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……If you have three hours to spare.

I would learn the meaning behind her response well before 
reaching the café. A long line of people stretched before us, 
all seemingly heading for a certain shop……

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Correct, it's a popular café. At 15:35 on a weekend, 
you can expect a 45 minute wait on average.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……My plans took this into consideration, so it is not 
an issue to me, but what about you, Trainer?
choice_data_list: I'll line up with you, of course.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Is that so. Then let us find the end of the line.

Ten minutes into our wait… Eishin Flash had not spoken a word. 
Wanting to grab my chance to get to know her better, I tried to 
start a conversation.
choice_data_list: So, which cake did you like best today?

text_block_list.text:
No response… Thinking maybe she didn't want 
to talk, I was about to apologize when ——

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Yes, I would have to go with the fifth shop's Sachertorte. That's my favorite kind, in the end.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: To elaborate; the finish on that cake's chocolate fondant was exquisite. Its texture felt a little firm at first, but it was very soft and easy to eat once I bit into it.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
The softness of the fondant was great, of course, but that 
slightly firmer mouthfeel matched my tastes very well.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Then there's the aprikose, or apricot… Its sweet and tangy taste perfectly harmonized with ——

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
—— That's why I chose this cake as my favorite. 
Was this explanation sufficient for you?

text_block_list.name: Café Employee
text_block_list.text: Next in line, please. A spot's opened up～

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Huh? That was fast… how have 55 minutes passed already. I hadn't noticed at all.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: …Let's go in.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I already decided what to order. We can call a waitress 
over in 10 minutes, so take your time to pick.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Their signature seems to be a seasonal tart, so I will 
order the "seasonal tart and coffee set".

I had intended to order the same thing, but something else 
caught my eye while looking over the menu.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……! Let me see.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
"An original cake set from our sister store. 
Not listed in promotions as availability varies. 
Consider yourself lucky!"

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Mmm, an original cake… But, no, I already decided on this tart…

Knowing how strictly she keeps to her predetermined course, 
I'm certain she won't change her order now. So…

text_block_list.name: Café Employee
text_block_list.text: Are you ready to order?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Ah, umm…
choice_data_list: We'll take the tart and specialty sets.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Ah!

text_block_list.name: Café Employee
text_block_list.text: Great～ I'll be back with them shortly.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Trainer…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……Sure.

text_block_list.name: Café Employee
text_block_list.text: Here you are, one seasonal tart set, and one specialty set.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
The specialty set is… a double layered cake with chocolate 
and caramel. It looks beautiful and majestic, like an old 
German castle…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I can almost feel it melt in my mouth already…
choice_data_list: Here you go, half for you.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Huh? No, your fork clearly hasn't split the center —— 
…Wait, you're giving me half?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Ah, is that why you ordered the specialty…? 
But you're the one who ordered it, so ——
choice_data_list: <size=36>We don't have that much time. C'mon, take it.</size>

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Ah…… Well, if you insist…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……! It's certainly… dense. Just one bite feels quite heavy. 
Yet, it doesn't taste overly rich. This is truly…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Extremely delicious! Glücklich… It makes you happy, doesn't it?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
You can have half of mine in return. 
Let me just calculate where the middle ——
choice_data_list: I-I really don't need it to be that accurate.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
No, everything should be calculated properly. 
I have a measure, so I'll get it just right.
I had a fun time with Eishin Flash…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Thank you for treating me.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
That was even more delicious than I expected. 
Next time, I'd like to stay 30 minutes longer and 
try a different item off the menu.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……It's all thanks to an unforeseen event, isn't it.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I mean running into you by coincidence today. 
As a result, I've gained more than I had hoped for.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……Although, I can't accept relying on coincidences 
as the best way to go about things. Hence, what I took 
from this is that ——

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
When I next plan to visit a number of cake shops… 
would you mind accompanying me, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Thank you. Then I will note you down 
as my companion in my schedule.
I felt like I had gotten a little bit closer to Eishin Flash…
